snippet.title: Probe: A Game Dev Experience - Launch Trailer | PS5, PS4, PS VR
snippet.description: In Probe: A Game Dev Experience, you will get into the role of a specialist in problem solving. You will interact with the different heads of departments of a video game company and you will learn the secrets of how to create a video game. Improve your experience playing with PS VR!
